snpstats_get_MAF.Rd

Get MAF using snpStats package

snpstats_get_MAF(
  dat,
  bed_bim_fam,
  force_new_MAF = FALSE,
  nThread = 1,
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

LD_folder

Locus-specific LD output folder.
